title: Lissandra's ultimate needs fixing
body: I've mentioned this before and people kept insisting that this is not a bug. Well I'm tired of it and I wish I'm fast enough to take screenshots for all to see what I'm talking about. When I use her ultimate on herself, she  should be invulnerable and immune to all attacks. Yet Blitzcrank just grabbed me and pulled me OUT OF IT! You could still see her ice sculpture thing standing there, empty. And Quinn was able to shoot me while I was inside. Darius was able to use his ultimate on me and penetrate inside of the ice as well. What the hell?
